Talk0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think>The Demon King is surely building his
power somewhere in this world even now.<sp:0:4:0>I will remain here to perfectly tune this
construct body in preparation for the
final confrontation.<sp:0:4:0>Your task is to recover the hope Zelda left
to us. Find the Master Sword.<sp:0:4:0>When the time comes, our combined
might shall at last defeat Demon
King Ganondorf.<sp:0:4:0>You may call upon me using that ring,
whenever you need my aid.
Talk0020:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>The Deku Tree ought to have given you
clues as to the Master Sword's location.<sp:0:4:0>Zelda vowed to restore the blade. I have
no doubt that it is somewhere in Hyrule.
Talk0018:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>You now hold the Master Sword in hand.
The time for the final reckoning with the
Demon King has come.<sp:0:4:0>Call upon me whenever you have need of
my strength.
Talk0019:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Determination_00>I have already sworn my pledge to you.
Call upon me whenever you have need
of my strength.
Talk0021:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>I see that you already wield the Master
Sword, Link.<sp:0:4:0>The Demon King is surely building his
power somewhere in the world even now.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>You hold the sword of hope, which Zelda
left to you. <sp:5:1:0>The time of the final reckoning
is close at hand.<sp:5:1:0>
Let our combined might at last defeat
Demon King Ganondorf.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Determination_00>I will remain here to perfectly tune this
construct body that I might be ready for
the confrontation.<sp:0:4:0>I have already sworn my pledge to you.<sp:5:1:0>
Call upon me whenever you have need
of my strength.
Talk0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>Zelda vowed to restore the blade. I have
no doubt that it is somewhere in Hyrule.<sp:0:4:0>Seek the sacred tree of this era, which
you know as the Deku Tree.<sp:0:4:0>Zelda intended for you to meet with him
when you were ready to reclaim the
Master Sword.
Talk0016:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Determination_00>Link! You have reclaimed the Master
Sword. <sp:5:0:0>These are glad tidings.<sp:0:4:0>The Demon King is surely building his
power somewhere in the world even now.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>You hold the sword of hope, which Zelda
left to you. <sp:5:1:0>The time of the final reckoning
is close at hand.<sp:5:1:0>
Let our combined might at last defeat
Demon King Ganondorf.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>I will remain here to perfectly tune this
construct body that I might be ready for
the confrontation.<sp:0:4:0>I have already sworn my pledge to you.<sp:5:1:0>
Call upon me whenever you have need
of my strength.
